author: jcherry
title: Accelerator, Demo day, VC Capital
description: Projects need to turn ideas into businesses. This requires entrepreneurship support programs aligned with tenets of distributed governance.
solution: A virtual mentor/curriculum accelerator based on theories of stakeholder capitalism, providing a guided model for going from idea-to-Scale.
experience: 10 years operating award winning accelerator.  Founded 11 startups. Crypto investors since 2014. 2020 Baltimore impact person of the year.
